name: Kitten Klicker - with actual cats
description: i dont get why a game that is about kittens has no cats on the actual page but im gonna make it happen. it will happen. no one can stop me. also this is clearly still a wop. background cat provided by my friend maxdor. ps i totally just copied pastad the grassy theme and messed with a few settings. that should be obvious if u look at the html.
